statements: DELETE FROM wildlife_data WHERE species_name = 'Tiger' AND habitat_type = 'Jungle';
DELETE FROM wildlife_data WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' AND population_size < 1000;
DELETE FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_size < 1000 OR habitat_id IN (SELECT habitat_id FROM habitat WHERE area < 5000);
DELETE FROM habitat WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' AND area > 10000;
DELETE FROM Population WHERE species_id = 2 AND habitat_id = 3
DELETE FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE habitat_id IN (SELECT habitat_id FROM Habitat WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest');
